survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their experiences with public EV charging stations, including ease of use, reliability, and overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity. This question helps segment users by frequency of use.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Charging speed (e.g., Level 2, DC Fast Charging)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. This question identifies key priorities for users.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Charging speed (e.g., Level 2, DC Fast Charging)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations you have used?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations you have used?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
